name: Demon Hunter
description:
A dark demon appeared in this peaceful place and destroyed the city, and those who opposed it were killed or lured into blood offerings.
You are the only force to resist and defeat the ever-growing evil onslaught.

The game consists of 21 stages in a nuclear and slash game, clear each stage and kill the final boss demon lord to restore peace

Soul Shards can be obtained by killing dark demons. Collect soul fragments to improve skill stats
You should defeat more powerful demons and proceed

There are 6 attributes 36 skills, find powerful skill combinations and enjoy efficient combat
